name: Global Summit on Polymer Science and Composite Materials
content: GSPSCM2024, the Global Summit on Polymer Science and Composite Materials, is a premier international conference happening in Prague, Czech Republic from September 16-18, 2024\. This event focuses on the integration of critical techniques in Polymer Science and Composite Materials, bringing together top academics and emerging researchers for collaboration on multidisciplinary challenges. It's a global platform for sharing vital information and fostering stimulating discussions in these fields.
